I am a vegetarian who is concerned about my father's health.

content.text: Not bad, but I am a bit stressed. I am waiting to hear back about if I got into the college I applied to.
Oh, well good luck! I'm sure you'll hear back soon. I'm a vegetarian, too! Are you one too?
Yes! I love it. It's been a few years since I gave up meat. How long have you been vegetarian?
Oh, not long. I think it's been about a year now. I love it though. I've been working as a bartender for the past 3 years and I love it.
Oh, that's cool! I've always wanted to be a bartender. What's it like?
It's really fun. I get to meet a lot of different people and I get to make a lot of tips.
That's awesome! I'm glad you like it. I'm a bit nervous about starting college, but I'm excited too.
Well you'll do great! Just keep your head up and you'll do fine.
